title: Nothing Like Live Music
post_excerpt: Are you ready for a night that goes down in your vacation history book; a high energy unforgettable evening where the night air fills your lungs as you root on your favorite music artist? ...
post_content:
Are you ready for a night that goes down in your vacation history book; a high energy unforgettable evening where the night air fills your lungs as you root on your favorite music artist? If so, find your way over to Jannus Live in Downtown St. Petersburg! The outdoor medium-sized concert venue hosts numerous concerts for local and mainstream artists. So whether you are looking to jam out to the reggae sounds of Damian Marley or want to discover some local talent, Jannus Live is the place to go. Jannus Live, the “oldest concert venue in Florida,” was once named Jannus Landing after pilot Tony Jannus. The venue has definitely earned its stripes for longevity in St. Petersburg, and amazing music spanning across many genres. But they also know what it takes to refuel its guests while they cheer for their favorite artists.  Jannus Live provides full service liquor and beer bars located throughout, as well as pizza from Joey Brooklyn’s Famous Pizza Kitchen. What better way to end a life changing concert than with pizza and beer?

 For more information on tickets and special artists visit: https://www.jannuslive.com/
